resources.string: "To get access to Messaging's full functionality, allow the app to connect to the internet, and turn on Mi Message and Smart Messaging."

"Mi Message lets you send messages to other Mi Message users over the internet without incurring charges. An outgoing SMS message is required to activate Mi Message. Your carrier will charge you for this message."
"For displaying beginner's guide to new users"
For accessing IMEI in order to identify your device
For saving images, videos, files, and other RCS attachments
This feature allows you to send and receive RCS messages. RCS Messaging is provided by China Mobile.
Smart Messaging provides Sender ID recognition and smart menu services.
Read and agree to our %1s and %2s before using this feature.
"If you choose not to give the required permissions or don't allow us to collect and use your data, this app won't be able to work normally."
"We respect and protect your privacy. Note that %1s needs to collect your data and requires the following permissions to work normally:"
You can revoke your authorization and turn off services in the Messaging settings.
Read and agree to our %1s before using this feature.
Read and agree to our %1s, %2s, and %3s before using these features.
